page.title: 17RELIGION. HOLT. WORCS.
page.content: The Anglican parish church of St. Martin at Holt is the only place of worship in this area. Reached bya long lane passing the quarry, it stands, with Holt castle and farm buildings, isolated from the communities in Holt Heath and Holt Fleet. The Rector no longer lives in the village but in nearby village of Grimley,where he is alsothe parish priest. However, this beautiful little, mainly Norman church is very well cared for and there is at least one service according to the rites of the Church of England every Sunday.
